name: Douse Sute Rarerunonara, Saigo Ni Suki Nisaseteitadakimasu
100 no Egao de Arigatou
nutshell:
Two salesmen are working at a car dealership. One is a veteran salesman while the other is a newcomer to the business. When the newcomer enthusiastically thanks their customers, he is told that it's inappropriate. The veteran explains that each business requires a different method.
Japanese version
English version
French version

name: Silly Little Abella
nutshell: Seokyung Kang is the most in-demand math teacher in the most prestigious town in the country. One day, she is driven over by a truck and wakes up as Abella, a gorgeous but intellectually challenged daughter of the Archduke. Before she could even get a hold of what was going on, she has to marry the "monster," a hunchback imperial prince who has burns all over his body! But the so-called "monster" turns out to be a hunk and a pretty boy! Now, Abella has to figure out what's her mysterious husband's mind while battling a group of mean imperial in-laws. Can Abella use her role as the "fool of the court" to her advantage to turn her married life around? Watch out, this fool is coming for you!

name: How To Raise A Victim?
tags: Time Travel,Historical,Action,Long Strip,Romance,Boys' Love,Drama,Fantasy,Web Comic,Mystery,Adaptation,Full Color,Tragedy
nutshell:
"You must die.”
Nigel was killed by his loyal knight, Inas.
For a moment he despaired at the unbelievable fact, and when he came to his senses, he had returned to the past.
“It’s okay, Nigel. See you again."
And he was killed again by Inas, who left behind words that he couldn't understand and returned.
Why is Inas keep trying kill him?
Will Nigel be able to get out of this cycle of regression?

name: Sickly? Husband's Contractual Wife
nutshell:
Reincarnation became a villain who poisoned her husband in a novel, but she was actually just a down-and-out young lady who was forced to contract marriage... If she didn't give birth to an heir, she would be driven away by her mother-in-law, and her husband who was sick and weak also kept her away from her. "We can pretend to be husband and wife, but we can't have children." Who is poisoning his husband? Selene is determined to investigate and help her husband recover. And in the process, her husband's attitude gradually changed?

Official S. Chinese

name: Pure White Elizabeth
nutshell:
I became the female lead. The strong and beautiful "Elizabeth Lily" who has special powers. But the path to the flowery road is too difficult. I was enslaved, brainwashed, abused… However, there were still many more hardships to come for the female lead from the original novel. If this continues, I'm going to die before I even meet the male lead! In the end, I made up my mind. I decided to change the original plot with the supporting character, a grumpy and dangerous wizard, "Ashlot." However…
"Alright, I'll raise her."
"Are you serious? Do you know how to raise a child, Ashlot?"
"Taking care of their diet, education, keeping them safe. If you want to get married, I’m going to thoroughly test him and get rid of him."
No! That’s not it!

In The Tale of the Land of Velpera, Elizabeth Lily is said to be the most brilliant sorceress of the century. But in real life, little Ellie is abused and enslaved for her ability to summon demons. That is until she's rescued by the powerful sorcerer Ashelotte Vayne, Elizabeth’s sworn enemy in the story! Now, this unlikely pair must work together so that Ellie can overcome the dark forces which threaten her and fulfill her destiny as the one and only Elizabeth Lily!

Original Webtoon: Daum, KakaoPage
Official Translations:

English
Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语
Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語
Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia
Japanese / 日本語
Thai / ภาษาไทย

name: The Evil Prince's Incomparable Evil Princess
nutshell: A top secret service agent has travelled back to ancient times and is being forced to get married! She heard that whoever marries her future husband will be cursed, and there are a bunch of villains both inside and outside of the mansion!? Guards! Take down all of them and bring them to me! Watch me tear down the conniving little b*tches, trample over the phony coquettes, and divorce my husband!!

name: Atsui Karada Koisuru Karada
nutshell: Nakajima Rito loved his sensei, Sawaki Eiki. But he didn't know that the feeling was mutual. On the other hand, his physics sensei, Fujimori, kept coming between them. Fujimori liked Sawaki and used Sawaki's feeling for Nakajima to threaten Sawaki to sleep with him. Would our lovebirds be able to fend off Fujimori's attack?

name: The S-Classes That I Raised - Save The Princess (From The Tentacles)
Billionaires Are Only for You
nutshell: "Asshole Yin Shaojie, you know you are bullying me!" She complained to him, but the devil smiled evilly, "You are my wife, I don't bully you, who is bullying?" They are childhood sweethearts. Being asked to live together, forcibly cultivate relationships. He disliked her in

name: I Became the Class Representative
nutshell: The story of the Red haired boy and the Braided glasses girl.

name: Super Secret
nutshell: Gyeonwo and Eunho have been together since their childhood as neighbors and friends, however, as Eunho goes through her new-found college life, she becomes aware of her neighbor's secret. A cute slice-of-life 4koma styled webtoon with a supernatural twist.

name: Akiru made Hanasou yo
nutshell: Trying to avoid being so popular with women, the legendary girl-magnet Takeuchi transfers to an all-boys school. Once there, he can’t help but wonder why Iida, who he’s known for a while, always eats his lunch early. At first he only thought him a little strange, but before he realized it, he found himself following him with his eyes all the time. The two become close by Iida sharing his bento. Being with the fun-loving Iida every day turns Takeuchi’s dull days into fun ones?! A series about the tantalizing love between a wholesome young man sharing his bento with a girl-magnet, a gorgeous masterpiece compilation including an extra, and one of the first pieces written in the name “Uchida Kaoru”!!

name: Death Note: L FILE No. 15
nutshell: Special one-shots published in Matsuyama Kenichi's Photobook

name: Restart
nutshell:
Unpopular model Tadashi and the junior - yet much more popular - model Aki… Even though there's undoubtedly a distance between them but after the day the drunk Aki took Tadashi, Tadashi's heart won't stop trembling…
Extra chapter is about their first meeting with each other.

name: Missile to Plankton
nutshell:
Tatsuko Sachi was a stupid girl who remade herself as a 'genius' at a prestigious school in order to be near the boy she liked, Oumi Shouta. When Shouta decided to make a club to build missiles, she then agreed to be vice president.
However, Shouta slacks off and leaves most of the work to Sachi. This becomes worse when a childlike girl named Onda Midori shows up, and Shouta spends all his time doting on her. Not even having superpowers makes this situation easier to handle.

name: The Dragon's School is on Top of the Mountain
nutshell: A collection of fantasy stories that take a somewhat realistic focus. A few of the first look into what happens after the defeat of an evil magical overlord, both for the people left behind and for the vanquishing hero. Others involve a schoolgirl angel, and working centaurs.

name: Boku no Osekkai Darling
nutshell: Worried that his son might be gay, widowed salaryman Nobu asks his colleague for advice on the situation. Drinking his sorrows away, he meets the beautiful Hijiri and they end up spending the night together. Then next morning, due to circumstances, Hijiri ends up staying with Nobu.

name: Mizuho Ambivalent
nutshell: Tashiro Mizuho is your typical middle school teen… except for the fact that he is a cross-dresser! When an upper-classman's sister transfers into his class after living abroad, what awaits Mizuho in the future?

name: Kimi wa Amai Amai...
nutshell:
Katase and Kohiwa are high school classmates. Liking someone so much it makes your head spin, exchanging kisses with every little chance, touching each other, connecting your bodies…
The main story is about two guys in the spring of their youth who find themselves rapidly drowning in one another. Also included in this highly-anticipated debut book are the sweet and heartbreaking one-shots, "Tranquilize" and "The Thorns are Hurting my Cheeks".

name: Joukamachi no Dandelion -Anthology Comic-
nutshell: A collection of side stories drawn by different artists based on the 4-koma series, Joukamachi no Dandelion.

name: Umi no Kishidan
nutshell: It’s the 16th century and the knights of the Mediterranean country Malta take pride in being the strongest in the world. Aciel is a beautiful lady-knight who gradually makes her way into the group of the knights, despite the fact it’s forbidden for women to be knights. Learn the tale of the magnificent knights whose charms neither friends nor foes can resist!

name: Akuma no Mama
nutshell:
Seir, a demon who was summoned by fourth grader Sakura, in order to fulfill her wish, now spend his days struggling with "How to be a Mama"!
From the author of "Ani no Yome to Kurashiteimasu" Kuzushiro.
A heart-warming daily lives comedy.

name: Hoshihimemura no Naishobanashi
nutshell: Kanzaki Hajime, overwhelmed by urban girls. He then change his mind, come back to his hometown Hoshihime village, but, the girls in that village also…?!

name: Kore wa Kitto Yume no Naka no Kiss
nutshell: Minato has a habit of dating guys who are pretty abusive and the one he's seeing now is no exception. One day, he takes notice of a certain customer who keeps gazing at a sculpture outside the cafe. Turns out that he is the very artist responsible for that creation.

name: Akuyaku Reijou no Hatsujou-ki
nutshell: I was reincarnated into the world of the otome game "Prince of Prince" as Rose, the hated villainess. Originally, the heroine and the prince were supposed to be attracted to each other, and due to the influence of a special pheromone, they were supposed to go into heat, but for some reason, now the pheromone works on the villainess and the prince...?! "It's different from the game I know..

name: Ayakashi Tsukai no Yome Sagashi
nutshell: Ryuuichirou moved to the countryside in order to attend university, where he gets attacked by the handsome landlord, Akon Tenkawa. Akon says he's been searching centuries for Ryuuchirou and that they used to be lovers. Ryuuichirou has no memories of their past lives and naturally refuses Akon's advances – and yet his heart…!

name: Vampire Man
nutshell: Dr. Ye Hakyung became the personal doctor of the Bae sisters who have rare blood types. The youngest of the two sisters has an interest in sex, so she finds ways to do it with the doctor. He spirals down to the world of the black market, and unfortunately, the Bae sisters are involved

name: Sensei to Iwareru hodo Baka de Nashi
nutshell: Siempre ha admirado la carrera de un Maestro, pero en cuanto crecía la realidad de cómo pueden ser realmente la golpeó. Así que, cuando este nuevo Sensei estuvo frente a ella… ¿Lo juzgó muy fuerte? 9 años después, ellos se vuelven a encontrar.

name: Tiger & Carpenter
nutshell: "Please mate with me." A tiger's sweet and passionate advances and burly body makes me melt… "Wait… that was just the tip? You've got to be kidding…!!?"
